prompt: Design a bold analytics dashboard with a dark purple background (#311B92). The top app bar should display 'Analytics Center' in a bold white font with a download icon on the right. Arrange three metric cards in a horizontal row, showing 'Active Users' (12,345), 'Total Sales' (18,900), and 'Engagement Rate' (4.5%) with white icons, 14px padding, and 16px border radius. Each card should have a vibrant purple background and a glowing white shadow. Below, include a column chart visualization (300px height) with a purple-to-white gradient, in a card with a white border. At the bottom, add a data table with columns 'Date', 'Users', 'Sales', and 'Engagement', using alternating dark purple and black rows. Use 16px padding throughout and a column-based layout for a bold, striking design.
